body:
The problem exists for both xpcshell tests and mochi tests, but for different files. We don't share any modules between the two.

I'm really uncomfortable with "global all the stuff in that file automagically". It confuses me, it confuses our linters, and it makes the code harder to read and understand later. I'll stick with the support files.
